message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.IR, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
1. cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) - The paper discusses a new way of interacting with computers using hand gestures, which falls under the domain of HCI. 
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) - The paper involves fingertip extraction and motion tracking, which are tasks related to computer vision. 
3. cs.GR (Graphics) - The paper discusses drawing shapes on a monitor, which is related to graphics. 
4. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper may be relevant to information retrieval systems that use hand gestures as a means of input. 
5. cs.MM (Multimedia) - The paper may be relevant to multimedia systems that use hand gestures as a means of input.
